homeHeader.title: Multiply Your Income with a Real Estate Service License
homeHeader.description: Tap into the UAE’s booming real estate market, world-class infrastructure, and enticing tax-free environment to enjoy competitive ROIs. Buy, sell, and rent lucrative real estate properties to diversify your portfolio. Our experts handle every step to help fast-track your real estate journey.

leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify Real Estate Licensing in Dubai

items.title: Book a No-Obligation Call
items.description: We’ll kick off with a free consultation to assess your business needs and goals, to determine the ideal licensing process.

items.title: Ensure You Meet All Requirements
items.description: Next, our experts will provide you with a checklist to ensure you meet the basic eligibility, educational, and training requirements.

items.title: Secure Your RERA Certificate
items.description: To ensure a 100% compliant real estate business setup in Dubai, you’ll have to apply for and obtain a DLD-approved real estate license.

items.title: Submit Your Documents
items.description: Once you secure your RERA certificate, we’ll help you collect and submit all the necessary documents, including a police clearance certificate.

items.title: Get All Approvals
items.description: Lastly, we’ll assist you in filing the application form, paying the fees, and collecting your Dubai-based real estate license.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can expats become real estate agents in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: Yes, our seasoned consultants guide you through every step of the real estate licensing process to help you kickstart your professional journey in the UAE.

items.question: Can One Nexuz assist me in canceling my UAE real estate license?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our experts can help you cancel your real estate license through the Trakheesi portal.

items.question: Absolutely! Our experts can help you cancel your real estate license through the Trakheesi portal.
items.answer: Dubai boasts one of the most lucrative real estate markets, offering high rental yields, no income and capital gains taxes, diverse properties, and unlimited growth potential.

items.question: How long does it take to secure a real estate license in Dubai?
items.answer: It can take 1-21 days, depending on your business activity, selected jurisdiction, and document readiness.

items.question: What qualifications do I need to launch my real estate career?
items.answer: You’ll need to complete RERA’s compulsory training course, obtain your certificate, and register with the DLD to rent, buy, and sell properties in the UAE.
